img.alt: File:Flag of Chile.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Chile.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,500 × 1,000 pixels, file size: 884 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

table.style: border:2px solid #d3d3d3; background-color:white; clear: both; margin: 0.5em auto; width:100%; text-align:center; cellpadding:0px; direction:ltr;

img.alt: Flag of Chile.svg

div.p: W3C ✓ The source code of this SVG is valid

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

tr.td:
Bandera de Chile,
La Estrella Solitaria

img.alt: FIAV 111111.svg

tr.td:
flag contains a star (special formation of the stars: none).
Construction sheet:

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

p.span: Alemannisch | Boarisch | Български | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Hrvatski | Magyar | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Română | Русский | ไทย | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | 粵語 | +/−

td.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; font-weight: bold

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

img.alt: Public domain

span.i: This file has fallen into the public domain according to Chilean copyright law (No. 17,336 and its amendments). However, some restrictions have to be addressed:

li.span: If the author is unknown and it was published 70 years ago, it is public domain.
If the author is known, or it is an unpublished work, the work has to be at least 120 years old.
Its author and source must be acknowledged, except if the author is unknown.

p.span: See here for the type of material that are in the Public domain.

a.title: Public domain in this flag's jurisdiction

img.alt: Public domain in this flag's jurisdiction

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 02:26, 8 March 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 07:22, 17 November 2009

td.span: (Reduce code, mostly a lot of empty spaces.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:16, 13 September 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 22:10, 13 September 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 19:52, 7 June 2006

td.span: (Pantone to RGB as in Commons:Pantone color chart. Not great differenc. Not dimensions change)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:39, 30 April 2006

td.span: (Make the star exact (User:Pumbaa80's idea); colors are unchanged.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:16, 18 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 20:03, 18 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 03:24, 12 February 2006

td.span: (restore the high-precision star. Colors are the same: red=#d21034, blue=#0035ad)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:09, 11 February 2006

td.span: (Pantone 186C for red and 286C for blue, see discussion; scaled to more manageable size)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:08, 5 February 2006

td.span: (The flag of Chile. This file was written by David Benbennick. The colors are defined by the "Government of Chile". It's easy to put a border around this flag: {{border|100px}} {{PD-self}})

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:17, 5 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 21:58, 8 January 2006

td.span: (The flag of Chile. This file was written by David Benbennick. It's easy to put a border around this flag: {{border|100px}} {{PD-self}} {{Insignia}} Category:Flags of Chile [[Category)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 19:58, 8 January 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 14:44, 8 December 2005

td.span: (more accurate geometry, keep colors the same. By me, PD.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 01:47, 29 October 2005
Thumbnail for version as of 22:36, 27 September 2005

td.span: (The flag of Chile. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of Chile)
